channel.title: Conferences on Welcome

item.title: ODSC
item.description: I attended ODSC (Open Data Science Conference) West in October 2019. Here are the notes that I took from every session that I attended while I was there. Day 1, Tuesday October 29, 2019 Interpretable Knowledge Discovery Reinforced by Visual Methods User-Centric Design for Data Scientists ML Flow: Platform for Complete Machine Learning Life Cycle Day 2, Wednesday October 30, 2019 Implict Deep Learning Towards a Blend of Machine Learning and Microeconomics
